messenger.setupMessage2: Dies ist wichtig, damit niemand außer Ihnen und die Nachrichtenempfänger auf den Inhalt Ihrer Nachrichten Zugriff hat.
messenger.setupMessage3: By default the content of your messages is fully encrypted. For heightened security you may wish to go to your app settings and turn off push notifications in order to disallow metadata from being tracked.

onboarding.earnTokens: Verdienen Sie Tokens für Ihre Aktivitäten
onboarding.weDontStorePhone: We do not store your phone number on our servers.
onboarding.suggestedChannelsDescription: Abonnieren Sie einige der beliebten Kanäle unten, die Sie interessieren.
onboarding.suggestedGroupsDescription: Treten Sie einigen der beliebten Gruppen unten bei, die Sie interessieren.
onboarding.tokensCanBeUsed: Tokens can be used to support other channels or boost your content for additional views (1 token = 1,000 views). In order to earn tokens, we will need a phone number to verify that your channel is unique.
onboarding.weJustSentCode: Wir haben den Code an {{phone}} geschickt, um die Richtigkeit der Nummer zu überprüfen.
onboarding.welcomePrivacy: Ihre Privatsphäre ist unsere Priorität. Es steht Ihnen frei, so viel oder so wenig Informationen zur Verfügung zu stellen, wie Sie es für bessere Empfehlungen wünschen und mit Menschen in Ihrer Umgebung in Kontakt zu treten.
onboarding.welcomeLater: Nein danke, ich werde es später tun
onboarding.hashtagInterest: Some hashtags that may be of interest to you.
onboarding.phoneNumberTooltip: Ihre Handynummer kann für zusätzliche Kontosicherheit, eindeutige Identifikation und um Ihren Freunden zu helfen, Sie zu finden. Diese Daten sind privat und verschlüsselt.
onboarding.dateofBirthTooltip: Bitte geben Sie Ihr Geburtsdatum ein, um Ihr Alter zu bestätigen und helfen Sie uns, unsere Empfehlungen zu verbessern.
onboarding.locationTooltip: Bitte gib deine Stadt ein, um uns zu helfen, dich mit Kanälen in deiner Nähe zu verbinden. Wir verfolgen nicht deinen genauen Standort.

wallet.phoneValidationMessage: To start earning rewards, you will need to enter a unique phone number.

learnMore.title: Mehr erfahren
learnMore.howWork: How the new rewards system works
learnMore.p1: Minds rewards you with crypto for contributing to the network. The first step in joining our rewards program is to provide your mobile number. We convert your number into a hash ID using SHA-256 encryption and a salt key to create a unique identifier for your account. We do not store your number on our servers.
learnMore.p2: Rather than rewarding you with Points in real-time, we are now distributing our crypto rewards as a “Daily Reward Pool”. During the test network, we will be experimenting with how the Daily Reward Pool is calculated, but it will ideally be automated based on user participation once we move into the Main Ethereum network.
learnMore.p3: Every day, we measure your contributions to the network and you receive a “Contribution Score” which can be found in the Contributions section of your wallet. We then calculate how much you contributed to the network relative to the entire community, which determines the percentage of the Daily Reward Pool that you earn.
learnMore.p4: It is important to note that with the new system, you will only receive credit for unique interaction, and you can only earn credit from another unique user once per metric per day. (If a friend votes on my content 100 times in a day, I will only get credit for 1 vote). This is critical in preventing gaming and abuse of the system as we move into more valuable token rewards. We are essentially measuring how many unique users you reached in a given day.
learnMore.p5: Daily rewards will be distributed at 02:00 am GMT everyday into your OffChain address.
learnMore.howContributionsP: Wir berechnen jeden Tag Ihren Beitrag mit dem folgenden gewichteten Scoring-System. Bitte beachten Sie, dass das neue System nur dem einmaligen Engagement zu verdanken ist (Benutzer, die eine Handynummer angegeben haben) also werden nicht alle Engagements, die Sie erhalten, in Ihre Punktzahl einbezogen.
learnMore.onChainP1: OffChain tokens are stored on Minds servers, and they can be used the same way that you used your Points. There are no fees, and they can be used to Boost content for more views from the network or to Wire other creators who you support.
learnMore.onChainP2: You now have the ability to withdraw these tokens into your OnChain address.
learnMore.onChainP3: OnChain tokens are stored on the Ethereum public blockchain and are accessible from outside of the Minds platform, which is key for further decentralization. OnChain transactions, however, require a small Ethereum “gas” fee, which is the incentive for the Ethereum miners to process the transaction.
learnMore.onChainP4: For OnChain configuration, you have the ability to use MetaMask (a browser plugin), your mobile device, an existing Ethereum address or you can create your own with Minds. We recommend using MetaMask for the most seamless user experience. You can change this address by clicking on the “Addresses” tab on the wallet menu
